description.last_approved_text: "Do the unexpected, attack the unprepared." - Zhuge Liang

loading_screen_quotes.description: "Do the unexpected, attack the unprepared." - Zhuge Liang
loading_screen_quotes.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms

description.last_approved_text: "There are five possible operations for any army. If you can fight, fight; if you cannot fight, defend; if you cannot defend, flee; if you cannot flee, surrender; if you cannot surrender, die." - Sima Yi

loading_screen_quotes.description: "There are five possible operations for any army. If you can fight, fight; if you cannot fight, defend; if you cannot defend, flee; if you cannot flee, surrender; if you cannot surrender, die." - Sima Yi
loading_screen_quotes.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms

description.last_approved_text: "When a worthy person is born into a turbulent world, he has to be a soldier and gird on a three-span sword to step on the mountains to mend the sky." - Taishi Ci, of Wu, upon his deathbed.

loading_screen_quotes.description: "When a worthy person is born into a turbulent world, he has to be a soldier and gird on a three-span sword to step on the mountains to mend the sky." - Taishi Ci, of Wu, upon his deathbed.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms

description.last_approved_text: "Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered, those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. Thus the wise win before they fight, while the ignorant fight to win." - Zhuge Liang

loading_screen_quotes.description: "Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered, those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. Thus the wise win before they fight, while the ignorant fight to win." - Zhuge Liang
loading_screen_quotes.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms

description.last_approved_text: "He who wins people, prospers; he who loses them, fails. Your present plan should be to seek humans of high aims and farseeing views, and you can establish yourself firmly." - Zhou Yu

loading_screen_quotes.description: "He who wins people, prospers; he who loses them, fails. Your present plan should be to seek humans of high aims and farseeing views, and you can establish yourself firmly." - Zhou Yu
loading_screen_quotes.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms

description.last_approved_text: "A land long united, must divide." - Luo Guanzhong, from the opening to Romance of the Three Kingdoms

loading_screen_quotes.description: "A land long united, must divide." - Luo Guanzhong, from the opening to Romance of the Three Kingdoms
loading_screen_quotes.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms

description.last_approved_text: "A land long divided, must unite." - Luo Guanzhong, from the opening to Romance of the Three Kingdoms

loading_screen_quotes.description: "A land long divided, must unite." - Luo Guanzhong, from the opening to Romance of the Three Kingdoms
loading_screen_quotes.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms

description.last_approved_text: "To send men into battle without having trained them is simply to throw them away." - Ying Shao

loading_screen_quotes.description: "To send men into battle without having trained them is simply to throw them away." - Ying Shao
loading_screen_quotes.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms

description.last_approved_text: "I'd rather betray others, than have others betray me." - 190 AD after mistakenly killing Lu Boshe

loading_screen_quotes.description: "I'd rather betray others, than have others betray me." - 190 AD after mistakenly killing Lu Boshe
loading_screen_quotes.title: Cao Cao

description.last_approved_text:
"Though the tortoise blessed with magic powers lives long, 
Its days have their allotted span; 
Though winged serpents ride high on the mist, 
They turn to dust and ashes at the last; 
An old war-horse may be stabled, 
Yet still it longs to gallop a thousand li; 
And a noble-hearted man though advanced in years 
Never abandons his proud aspirations. 
Man's span of life, whether long or short, 
Depends not on Heaven alone; 
One who eats well and keeps cheerful 
Can live to a great old age. 
And so, with joy in my heart, 
I hum this song." 
 - Cao Cao 207AD

loading_screen_quotes.description:
"Though the tortoise blessed with magic powers lives long, 
Its days have their allotted span; 
Though winged serpents ride high on the mist, 
They turn to dust and ashes at the last; 
An old war-horse may be stabled, 
Yet still it longs to gallop a thousand li; 
And a noble-hearted man though advanced in years 
Never abandons his proud aspirations. 
Man's span of life, whether long or short, 
Depends not on Heaven alone; 
One who eats well and keeps cheerful 
Can live to a great old age. 
And so, with joy in my heart, 
I hum this song." 
 - Cao Cao 207AD
loading_screen_quotes.title: Cao Cao

description.last_approved_text: "This is the midspring season, and the dragon chooses this moment for its transformations like a person realizing his own desires and overrunning the world. The dragon among animals compares with the hero among people. - Cao Cao

loading_screen_quotes.description: "This is the midspring season, and the dragon chooses this moment for its transformations like a person realizing his own desires and overrunning the world. The dragon among animals compares with the hero among people. - Cao Cao
loading_screen_quotes.title: Cao Cao

description.last_approved_text: "We three---Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei---though of different families, swear brotherhood, and promise mutual help to one end. We will rescue each other in difficulty; we will aid each other in danger. We swear to serve the state and save the people. We ask not the same day of birth, but we seek to die together. May Heaven, the all-ruling, and Earth, the all-producing, read our hearts. If we turn aside from righteousness or forget kindliness, may Heaven and Human smite us!" - from Romance of the Three Kingdoms

loading_screen_quotes.description: "We three---Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei---though of different families, swear brotherhood, and promise mutual help to one end. We will rescue each other in difficulty; we will aid each other in danger. We swear to serve the state and save the people. We ask not the same day of birth, but we seek to die together. May Heaven, the all-ruling, and Earth, the all-producing, read our hearts. If we turn aside from righteousness or forget kindliness, may Heaven and Human smite us!" - from Romance of the Three Kingdoms
loading_screen_quotes.title: Liu Bei

description.last_approved_text: "The Hans are sinking: Designing ministers steal away their authority. I am weak, yet I desire to restore the state to its right mind. But my ignorance is too vast, my means are too slender, and I know not where to turn. Only you, Master, can lighten my darkness and preserve me from falling. How happy should I be if you would do so!" - Liu Bei, when meeting Zhuge Liang

loading_screen_quotes.description: "The Hans are sinking: Designing ministers steal away their authority. I am weak, yet I desire to restore the state to its right mind. But my ignorance is too vast, my means are too slender, and I know not where to turn. Only you, Master, can lighten my darkness and preserve me from falling. How happy should I be if you would do so!" - Liu Bei, when meeting Zhuge Liang
loading_screen_quotes.title: Liu Bei

description.last_approved_text: "Do no evilness because it is a small one; do not leave a small deed undone because it is just a petty one" - Liu Bei

loading_screen_quotes.description: "Do no evilness because it is a small one; do not leave a small deed undone because it is just a petty one" - Liu Bei
loading_screen_quotes.title: Liu Bei

description.last_approved_text: "I will not slay you as I ought, but go, and go quickly! Yield the Pass and I may spare your lives. If you delay, I will grind your bones to powder and make mincemeat of your flesh!" - Sun Jian, 191 upon being offered a marriage proposal by Dong Zhuo

loading_screen_quotes.description: "I will not slay you as I ought, but go, and go quickly! Yield the Pass and I may spare your lives. If you delay, I will grind your bones to powder and make mincemeat of your flesh!" - Sun Jian, 191 upon being offered a marriage proposal by Dong Zhuo
loading_screen_quotes.title: Sun Jian

description.last_approved_text: "For manipulating the might of Wu so as to make it the deciding force among the factions and then obtaining the whole empire, you are not so suited as I. But in encouraging the wise and confiding in the able and getting the best out of everyone for the preservation of this land, I should not succeed as you will. Remember with what toil and labour your father and I have won what we possess, and take good care thereof." - Sun Ce on his deathbed passing control of Wu to Sun Quan

loading_screen_quotes.description: "For manipulating the might of Wu so as to make it the deciding force among the factions and then obtaining the whole empire, you are not so suited as I. But in encouraging the wise and confiding in the able and getting the best out of everyone for the preservation of this land, I should not succeed as you will. Remember with what toil and labour your father and I have won what we possess, and take good care thereof." - Sun Ce on his deathbed passing control of Wu to Sun Quan
loading_screen_quotes.title: Sun Quan

description.last_approved_text: "If I had a son like Sun Ce, I should die without regret." - Yuan Shu on Sun Ce joining his service.

loading_screen_quotes.description: "If I had a son like Sun Ce, I should die without regret." - Yuan Shu on Sun Ce joining his service.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Sun Ce
